title: 03/16/2021 - HOUR 1 - Patriots, Newton, Washington
itunes:title: 03/16/2021 - HOUR 1 - Patriots, Newton, Washington
description:
The Patriots are once again being smart in free agency

Cam Newton isn't a bad QB

Washington would have been better off with Alex Smith

Rob Gronkowski was smart to come back to Tampa Bay


Guest: Peter Schrager

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
